name: Framed Hardstone Panel
description: Framed Hardstone Panel; Unknown; Florence, Tuscany, Italy; about 1970; hardware and ancient stone 17th century; Frames: ebony; Panles: Breccia d'Aleppo in the center surrounded by (clockwise from the top) breccia di Seravezza or Medicea, breccia sfrangiata or lumachella rosso scura, rosso antico marble, alabaster fiorito di Palombara, alabaster egiziano, giallo antico di Numidia marble, granite verde minuto egiziano, and alabaster diasprato orientale; 77.5 cm (30 1/2 in.); 95.SE.57.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
